allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AI hardware investment research vault

- Overview with investment thesis and equipment landscape slides
- Company memos: CAMT, PSTG, TPRO, FORM, KLAC, LRCX, plus existing ALAB, BESI, MU
- Financial metrics images and company product images
- Templates for analysis framework

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update memos with patent analytics and style improvements

- Add patent analysis sections to BESI, LRCX, CAMT, KLAC, PSTG, MU
- Fix HBM "duopoly" error to "one of three suppliers"
- Remove Obsidian wiki links for easier export
- Flatten memo style \(less flowery, more objective\)
- Add memory price graph to Micron memo
- Include all patent analytics images

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
